metadata.synopsis: The party comments on reading and attempting to decipher the records of the mad drow wizard, who was one of the three looking for the Adamantine Forge.The records mention a group who located the Adamantine Forge, laying somewhere in the depth of the Underdark, and barely survived the undefeatable protector who guarded it - the adamantine golem, who has one weakness - being heated and struck by a huge forge hammer.
metadata.how_to_trigger: * goto -55; 33; -158* kill Filro, loot and read his records

0.text: A bunch of gibberish, as far as I can tell.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: |Just reading through this gibberish causes a headache! Nothing but madness.|

2.speaker: Player
2.text: According to these notes, there's an adamantine forge down here.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: |Records mention Adamantine Forge... interesting.|NodeContext: AdamanTEEN

5.context: InternalNodeContext: |So much madness here ... But there is some sense between the lines. The"protector of the forge" - whoever it is - is only vulnerable when heated.|NodeContext: AdamanTEEN
